channel.title: Rsync Guide - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Using Rsync to sync a folder between two hosts I was using github to sync my notebook with my website. But that introduces some extra steps that rsync can easily eliminate. Install rsync apt install rsyncTo upload files from your local computer to your server rsync -rtvzP /path/to/file root@example.org:/path/on/the/serverTurn the above script into an alias We will be adding an alias so you do not have to type the entire command above every time.
